mio.utilities.summarystats package¶

Submodules¶

mio.utilities.summarystats.burstiness module¶

The ‘Burstiness’ summary statistic

class mio.utilities.summarystats.burstiness.Burstiness(mean_trajectories=True, improvement=False)[source]¶

Bases: mio.utilities.summarystats.summary_base.SummaryBase

Burstiness = (sigma-mu)/(sigma+mu)

Ref: Burstiness and memory in complex systems, Europhys. Let., 81, pp. 48002, 2008.

compute(data)[source]¶

Calculate the value(s) of the summary statistic(s) :param data: simulated or data set :return: computed statistic value
